T02D1441:240a-1: mandala de ba sto tra ratna m'a ya d'a na n'a ma /
T02D1441:240a-3: dkyil 'khor gyi lha la bstod pa rin po che sgyu 'phrul sbyin pa zhes bya ba /
T02D1441:240a-4: bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D1441:240a-5: thabs dang shes rab rang bzhin dkyil 'khor phyag 'tshal te //
T02D1441:240a-6: gus pas bstod la byin rlabs myur 'byung bdag gis brjod //
T02D1441:240a-7: h'um phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas zhing kun bsdus pa'i dkyil 'khor na //
T02D1441:240a-8: bcom ldan dpal chen khro rgyal 'khor lo bde mchog ni //
T02D1441:240a-9: ye shes rnam par dag pa thams cad tshogs pa'i sku //
T02D1441:240a-10: 'jigs byed 'jigs par byed pa mthing nag rin chen 'od //
T02D1441:240a-11: zhal bzhi sngo dang dmar dang ser dang ljang ba'i dbu //
T02D1441:240a-12: ral ba'i thor tshugs zla phyed sna tshogs rdo rjes mdzes //
T02D1441:240a-13: dmar 'jigs brtson gzigs rab bgrad sdang mig glog ltar 'gyu //
T02D1441:240a-14: gtum rngam mche ba gtsigs shing 'jigs pa'i nga ro sgrogs //
T02D1441:240b-0: rol pa chen po'i smin mtshams khro gnyer rlabs @240b chen 'khrugs //
T02D1441:240b-1: ljags 'dril mchog las 'od 'phro h'um phat 'brug sgra che //
T02D1441:240b-2: lang tsho gzhon pa gar dgu'i nyams ldan 'gying bag can //
T02D1441:240b-3: sum cu rtsa gnyis mtshan dang dpe byad brgyad cus rgyan //
T02D1441:240b-4: rten 'brel bcu gnyis 'gags pa'i phyag rnams rab tu snang //
T02D1441:240b-5: dang po gnyis kyis rdo rje dril bu yum mchog 'dzin //
T02D1441:240b-6: thabs dang shes rab zhal sbyar bde chen mi rtog bzhugs //
T02D1441:240b-7: mtha' gnyis glang chen ko rlon mi lpags na bzar brgyangs //
T02D1441:240b-8: g-yon pa'i gnyis pa kha tv'am gsum pas thong khrag bkang //
T02D1441:240b-9: bzhi pa rdo rje zhags pa lnga pas tshangs mgo bsnams //
T02D1441:240b-10: g-yas pa'i gnyis pas cang te'u gsum pas mdung rtse gsum //
T02D1441:240b-11: bzhi pas rdo rje dgra sta lnga pa gri gug bsnams //
T02D1441:240b-12: rab tu brjid pa'i mgon po stag lpags sham thabs can //
T02D1441:240b-13: spyi gtsug 'khor lo nor bu snyan cha gdub kor dang //
T02D1441:240b-14: mgur chu phyag rgya sku regs thal bas rab tu brgyan //
T02D1441:240b-15: lha yi gdugs dkar mdzes pa steng na 'dzin pa'i dpal //
T02D1441:240b-16: brgya phyed khrag 'dzag mi mgo'i phreng ba'i ngo shal can //
T02D1441:240b-17: 'jigs byed dus mtshan ma rungs skrag cing gtsigs pa'i zhal //
T02D1441:240b-18: nyin mo'i dbang phyug gdan la zhabs gnyis brkyang bskum bzhugs //
T02D1441:240b-19: sna tshogs thabs kyis 'gro ba ma lus bde la sbyar //
T02D1441:240b-20: khro bo'i rgyal po thams cad gus pas khyed la 'dud //
T02D1441:240b-21: tshangs pa khyab 'jug dbang po lha chen tshogs bdag sogs //
T02D1441:240b-22: 'gro ba'i gtso bo thams cad 'jigs dang gus mchod pa'i //
T02D1441:240b-23: rgyal chen he ru ka dpal khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod//
T02D1441:240b-24: h'um dbus phyogs rnam dag rdo rje'i zhing gi dkyil 'khor na //
T02D1441:240b-25: bcom ldan 'das ma mkha' 'gro tshogs kyi gtso bo ni //
T02D1441:240b-26: chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes rnam par dag pa'i sku //
T02D1441:240b-27: byi ru'i 'od 'bar rdo rje phag mo bde gshegs skyed pa'i yum //
T02D1441:240b-28: 'dod pa'i dbang phyug skal ldan mkha' 'gro kun gyi rje ;
T02D1441:240b-29: / rdo rje dbyings kyi khro rgyal phyag rgya chen po'i sku //
T02D1441:240b-30: he ru ka dpal yang dag sbyor ba btsun mo'i rgyal //
T02D1441:240b-31: zhal gcig phyag gnyis spyan gsum dmar ser me stag 'phro //
T02D1441:240b-32: khro 'dzum zhal gyi mche ba gtsigs shing rol pa mo //
T02D1441:240b-33: dbu skra legs grol sked sor slob pa'i lha mo che //
T02D1441:241a-0: @241a * // thod pa skam pos dbu brgyan 'gro ba'i zhe sdang 'joms //
T02D1441:241a-1: phyag g-yas rdo rje gri gug sdigs mdzub gdug pa 'dul //
T02D1441:241a-2: g-yon pa thod pa sdang ba'i khrag gis bkang ba bsnams //
T02D1441:241a-3: dbu yi nor bu snyan cha gdub kor mgur chu dang //
T02D1441:241a-4: phyag gdub sku regs phyag rgya lnga yis rab tu brgyan //
T02D1441:241a-5: yi dags phra mo me shel nor bu'i gdan steng na //
T02D1441:241a-6: gcer mo rig pa'i rgyal mo zhabs gnyis brkyang bskum bzhugs //
T02D1441:241a-7: rdo rje lha mo khro mo'i gzugs can drag snyems ma //
T02D1441:241a-8: 'byung po'i 'jigs pa ma lus rdo rje chen pos 'joms //
T02D1441:241a-9: 'jig rten gsum phyogs gzhan gyis bsngo bas mi tshugs shing //
T02D1441:241a-10: bdud kyi 'jigs pa ma lus skem zhing pham mdzad ma //
T02D1441:241a-11: rdo rje gdan bzhugs tshangs sogs dbang byed las rgyal zhing //
T02D1441:241a-12: dngos grub kun 'byung rje btsun ma khyod phyag 'tshal bstod //
T02D1441:241a-13: shar phyogs rnam dag sangs rgyas zhing gi dkyil 'khor na ;
T02D1441:241a-14: / bcom ldan 'das ma sangs rgyas rigs kyi gtso mo ni //
T02D1441:241a-15: me long lta bu'i ye shes rnam par dag pa'i sku //
T02D1441:241a-16: rin chen bee d'u rya yi 'od 'bar mkha' 'gro ma //
T02D1441:241a-17: zhal gcig phyag bzhi spyan gsum skra grol mche bzhi gtsigs //
T02D1441:241a-18: thod pa kha tv'am gri gug cang te'u phyag na bsnams //
T02D1441:241a-19: 'khor lo snyan cha mgur chu phyag gdub mchod phyir thogs //
T02D1441:241a-20: phyag rgya lngas brgyan lang tsho rol ba sgeg pa'i sku //
T02D1441:241a-21: gcer mo g-yon brkyang srog song zla ba'i gdan la bzhugs //
T02D1441:241a-22: chos dbyings las bzhengs 'khor ba grol ba'i khro mo'i rgyal //
T02D1441:241a-23: ma mo nam mkha' khyab 'gro 'gro ba'i gti mug 'joms//
T02D1441:241a-24: sgyu 'phrul sna tshogs sems can don la khyab par
T02D1441:241a-25: 'jug / ye shes chen mo rnal 'byor skal ldan
T02D1441:241a-26: 'char ba mo // bdud dang mu stegs mi mthun
T02D1441:241a-27: phyogs rnams rdul du rlog / lam log 'gro ba
T02D1441:241a-28: bde la thabs kyis sbyor mdzad cing //
T02D1441:241a-29: dngos grub kun ster lha mo khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod //
T02D1441:241a-30: byang phyogs rnam dag las mchog zhing gi dkyil 'khor na //
T02D1441:241a-31: bcom ldan 'das ma las kyi rigs kyi gtso mo ni //
T02D1441:241a-32: bya ba grub pa'i ye shes rnam par dag pa'i sku //
T02D1441:241a-33: rin chen ma ra ka ta'i 'od 'bar l'a ma ni //
T02D1441:241b-0: zhal gcig phyag gnyis spyan gsum sgra grol mche bzhi @241b gtsigs //
T02D1441:241b-1: thod pa kha tv'am gri gug cang te'u phyag na bsnams //
T02D1441:241b-2: 'khor lo snyan cha mgur chu phyag gdub mchod phyir thogs //
T02D1441:241b-3: phyag rgya lngas brgyan lang tsho gzhon pa sgeg pa'i sku //
T02D1441:241b-4: gcer mo g-yon brkyang srog song zla ba'i gdan la bzhugs //
T02D1441:241b-5: chos dbyings las bzhengs 'khor ba sgrol ba'i khro mo'i rgyal //
T02D1441:241b-6: ma mo nam mkha' khyab 'gro 'gro ba'i phrag dog 'joms //
T02D1441:241b-7: sgyu 'phrul sna tshogs sems can don la khyab par
T02D1441:241b-8: 'jug / ye shes chen po rnal 'byor skal ldan
T02D1441:241b-9: 'char ba mo // bdud dang mu stegs mi mthun
T02D1441:241b-10: phyogs rnams rdul du rlog / lam log 'gro ba
T02D1441:241b-11: bde la thabs kyis sbyor mdzad cing //
T02D1441:241b-12: dngos grub kun ster lha mo khyod la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D1441:241b-13: nub phyogs rnam dag padma zhing gi dkyil 'khor na //
T02D1441:241b-14: bcom ldan 'das ma padma rigs kyi gtso mo ni //
T02D1441:241b-15: so sor rtog pa'i ye shes rnam par dag pa'i sku //
T02D1441:241b-16: rin chen padma r'a ga 'od 'bar dum skyes ma //
T02D1441:241b-18: phyag bzhi spyan gsum skra grol mche bzhi gtsigs //
T02D1441:241b-19: thod pa kha tv'am gri gug cang te'u phyag na bsnams //
T02D1441:241b-20: 'khor lo snyan cha mgur chu phyag gdub mchod phyir thogs //
T02D1441:241b-21: phyag rgya lngas brgyan lang tsho gzhon pa sgeg pa'i sku //
T02D1441:241b-22: gcer mo g-yon brkyang srog song zla ba'i gdan la bzhugs//
T02D1441:241b-23: chos dbyings las bzhengs 'khor ba sgrol ba'i khro mo'i rgyal //
T02D1441:241b-24: ma mo nam mkha' khyab 'gro 'gro ba'i 'dod chags 'joms //
T02D1441:241b-25: rdzu 'phrul sna tshogs sems can don la khyab par
T02D1441:241b-26: 'jug / ye shes chen mo rnal 'byor skal ldan
T02D1441:241b-27: 'char ba mo // bdud dang mu stegs mi mthun
T02D1441:241b-28: phyogs rnams rdul du rlog / lam log 'gro ba
T02D1441:241b-29: bde la thabs kyis sbyor mdzad cing //
T02D1441:241b-30: dngos grub kun ster lta mo khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod //
T02D1441:241b-31: lho phyogs rnam dag rin chen zhing gi dkyil 'khor na //
T02D1441:241b-32: bcom ldan 'das ma rin chen rigs kyi gtso mo ni //
T02D1441:241b-33: mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes rnam bar dag pa'i sku ;
T02D1441:241b-34: / rin chen gtso mo gser 'od 'bar ba gzugs can ma //
T02D1441:241b-35: zhal gcig phyag bzhi spyan gsum skra grol mche bzhi gtsigs //
T02D1441:241b-36: thod pa kha tv'am gri gug cang te'u phyag na bsnams //
T02D1441:241b-37: 'khor lo snyan cha mgur chu phyag gdub mchod phyir thogs //
T02D1441:242a-0: phyag rgya lngas brgyan lang tsho @242a * //
T02D1441:242a-2: gcer mo g-yon brkyang srog song zla ba'i gdan la bzhugs //
T02D1441:242a-3: chos dbyings las bzhengs 'khor ba sgrol ba'i khro mo'i rgyal //
T02D1441:242a-4: ma mo nam mkha' khyab 'gro 'gro ba'i nga rgyal 'joms /
T02D1441:242a-5: rdzu 'phrul sna tshogs sems can don la khyab par
T02D1441:242a-6: 'jug / ye shes chen mo rnal 'byor skal ldan
T02D1441:242a-7: 'char ba mo // bdud dang mu stegs mi mthun
T02D1441:242a-8: phyogs rnams rdul du rlog / lam log 'gro ba
T02D1441:242a-9: bde la thabs kyis sbyor mdzad cing //
T02D1441:242a-10: dngos grub kun ster lha mo khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod //
T02D1441:242a-11: de ltar bdag gis rab dad bas //
T02D1441:242a-12: dngos grub chen po 'byung ba'i rgyu //
T02D1441:242a-13: dkyil 'khor lha la gus bstod pas //
T02D1441:242a-14: dud dang kunda ltar dkar ba'i //
T02D1441:242a-15: dge des 'gro kun rdo rje 'dzin thob shog /
T02D1441:242a-16: dkyil 'khor gyi lha la bstod pa rin po che
T02D1441:242a-17: sgyu 'phrul sbyin pa zhes bya ba /
T02D1441:242a-18: slob dpon rdo rje dril bu pas mdzad pa rdzogs so /
T02D1441:242a-20: // / ma h'a pandi ta su ma ti k'irti dang /
